languages.text: {n}Вы размахиваетесь и изо всех сил швыряете таинственное устройство в одно из разбитых окон залы. Теперь одному Богу-Императору ведомо, где его искать — и, возможно, это к лучшему.{/n}

{n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы размахиваетесь и изо всех сил швыряете таинственное устройство в одно из разбитых окон залы. Теперь одному Богу-Императору ведомо, где его искать — и, возможно, это к лучшему.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps it is for the best.{/n}

{n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps it is for the best.{/n}

{n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

{n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你猛地甩着胳膊，尽你所能将这个神秘的装置丢进了大厅的破窗户里。现在，恐怕只有神皇才知道这件造物被丢到了什么地方，或许这才是最好的结果。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你猛地甩着胳膊，尽你所能将这个神秘的装置丢进了大厅的破窗户里。现在，恐怕只有神皇才知道这件造物被丢到了什么地方，或许这才是最好的结果。{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたは不気味な装置を荒々しく振り回すと、ホールの割れた窓から思い切り投げ捨てた。こうなってしまってはどこへ行ったのかは神帝陛下のみぞ知ることであり、おそらくそれが最良なのだろう。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたは不気味な装置を荒々しく振り回すと、ホールの割れた窓から思い切り投げ捨てた。こうなってしまってはどこへ行ったのかは神帝陛下のみぞ知ることであり、おそらくそれが最良なのだろう。{/n}

languages.text: {n}D'un grand geste, vous jetez l'objet mystérieux aussi fort que possible à travers une des fenêtres brisées de la salle. À présent, seul l'Empereur-Dieu saura où le chercher et ce n'est peut-être pas plus mal.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}D'un grand geste, vous jetez l'objet mystérieux aussi fort que possible à travers une des fenêtres brisées de la salle. À présent, seul l'Empereur-Dieu saura où le chercher et ce n'est peut-être pas plus mal.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Realizas unos salvajes giros con el misterioso dispositivo y lo lanzas tan fuerte como puedes a través de una de las ventanas rotas de la sala. Ahora solo el Dios Emperador sabe dónde buscarlo, y tal vez sea lo mejor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Realizas unos salvajes giros con el misterioso dispositivo y lo lanzas tan fuerte como puedes a través de una de las ventanas rotas de la sala. Ahora solo el Dios Emperador sabe dónde buscarlo, y tal vez sea lo mejor.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du holst weit aus und schleuderst das mysteriöse Gerät so stark wie möglich durch eines der zerbrochenen Fenster der Halle. Jetzt findet es nur noch der Gottimperator, und wahrscheinlich ist es so auch am besten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du holst weit aus und schleuderst das mysteriöse Gerät so stark wie möglich durch eines der zerbrochenen Fenster der Halle. Jetzt findet es nur noch der Gottimperator, und wahrscheinlich ist es so auch am besten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kolunu savurduğun gibi gizemli cihazı olabildiğince sertçe odanın kırık pencerelerinden birinden dışarı fırlatıyorsun. Artık nerede olduğunu ancak Tanrı İmparator bilir. Belki de en iyisi budur.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You swing wildly and hurl the mysterious device as hard as you can through one of the broken windows of the hall. Now only the God-Emperor knows where to look for it, and perhaps that is for the best.{/n}
